title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jun 30 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jun 30 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: Pennsylvania Supreme Court overturns Bill Cosby conviction, Cosby to go free. Clay puts on his lawyer hat to read through the details of the Cosby decision. What will this decision mean for the #MeToo movement? Callers react to the shocking Cosby news. Cosby can file a massive lawsuit against the state of Pennsylvania based on this ruling. Phylicia Rashad tweets in support of Cosby, praises the ruling.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
